title: str: <title of internship/program>
provider: str: <organization that hosts internship/program> or str: not provided
description: str: <as many sentences as required to explain what the internship/program is about>
subjects: str: <field of interest for internship> or str: not provided
tags: str: keyword tags such as research, mentorship, residential, etc.

requirements.essay_required: bool: true or false or str: not provided
requirements.recommendation_required: bool: true or false or str: not provided
requirements.transcript_required: bool: true or false or str: not provided
other: str: list of additional requirements or str: not provided

eligibility.rising: bool: true if: accepting rising grades, false if: not accepting rising grades
grades: str: freshman, sophomore, junior, senior, undergraduate or str: not provided

age.minimum: int: <minimum age>, str: none, or str: not provided
age.maximum: int: <maximum age>, str: none, or str: not provided

deadlines.name: str: <whatever the deadline is for>, or none
deadlines.priority: str: high, medium, low, or none
deadlines.date: str: mm-dd-yyyy, or str: not provided
deadlines.rolling_basis: bool: true if: rolling basis, false if: not rolling basis or str: not provided
deadlines.time: str: morning, noon, afternoon, evening, night, midnight, or str: hh:mm AM/PM, or str: not provided

dates.term: str: spring, summer, fall, winter, <other>, or str: not provided
dates.start: str: mm-dd-yyyy or str: not provided
dates.end: str: mm-dd-yyyy or str: not provided

duration_weeks: int: estimated program length in weeks, or str: not provided

location.virtual: bool: true if: virtual, false if: in-person
location.state: str: <state (in the US) of location of program>, if virtual: str: none, if none are provided: str: not provided
location.city: str: <city of location of program>, if virtual: str: none, if none are provided: str: not provided
location.address: str: <address of location of program>, if virtual: str: none, if none are provided: str: not provided

cost.name: str: <whatever the cost is for>, or none
cost.free: bool: true if: free, false if: costs money
cost.lowest: float: <dollar amount of lowest possible cost>, or str: if free: none, or str: not provided
cost.highest: float: <dollar amount of highest possible cost>, or str: if free: none, or str: not provided
cost.scholarship-available: bool: true if: scholarship available, false if: no scholarship available

stipend.available: bool: true if: stipend is available, false if: stipend is not available
stipend.amount: float: <dollar amount of stipend>, or str: not provided

contact.email: str: contact email or str: not provided
contact.phone: str: contact number or str: not provided
